Wesley's Mixing Manual:
- List of Ingredients and Mixing Formulas -

1. Low-Level Reagent Formulas
Dracoplasm: 10 units of Wyrm's Blood, 1 Blood Root
Magma Dust: 10 Lava Stones, 1 Volcanic Ash
Moon Dust: 10 Moonstone Shards, 1 Volcanic Ash
Necroplasm: 10 Rotten Bone Pieces, 1 Blood Root
Demonplasm: 10 units of Demon's Blood, 1 Blood Root
Inferno Dust: 10 Infernium Ores, 1 Volcanic Ash

2. High-Level Reagent Formulas
Draconic Essence: 10 units of Dracoplasm, 1 unit of Quicksilver
Fire Essence: 10 units of Magma Dust, 1 Brimstone
Lunargent: 10 units of Moon Dust, 1 unit of Quicksilver
Midnight Oil: 10 units of Dracoplasm, 1 unit of Quicksilver
Demonic Essence: 10 units of Demonplasm, 1 Brimstone
Abyss Oil: 10 units of Inferno Dust, 1 Brimstone
Hellfire Oil: 1 Fire Essence, 1 Demonic Essence
Nightmare Oil: 1 Lunargent, 1 unit of Midnight Oil
